div.p: Eagle Elementary is temporarily closed to prevent the spread of COVID-19. Communications regarding COVID-19 will be distributed on the Eagle Elementary Facebook page, ClassDojo, and via text message. To update your contact information please call 330-773-1100.
div.h3: Learning will continue through our new Virtual LEARNING program! Click here for more INFORMATION.
div.p: Please join us for an overview of our Virtual Learning program this Monday at 6:00 pm. To join the meeting click HERE. Meeting ID: 576 906 3830

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-collage combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

img.alt: Our Mission - To accept, appreciate, nurture, and challenge every student, every day.

div.p: To accept, appreciate, nurture, and challenge every student, every day.

At Eagle Elementary we believe all students should receive high quality education, personal growth, and a safe positive environment to reach their highest potential. We believe an education should serve its students in the real world by providing knowledge, critical thinking and problem solving skills. We believe that the development of self-respect, self-worth, and self-esteem can dramatically improve a childs outlook and is just as important as academics.
Robust curriculum, effective teaching, and access to resources that prepare students for the future
Development of self-worth and sense of social responsibility through helping others
The opportunity for self-expression, creativity, and passion through art, music, athletics, technology, and community

p.em: In 2017 Eagle Elementary was graded A for overall student growth and value added

div.p: As part of the 4th and 5th grade Life Skills Program your child will learn how to navigate the real world through a variety of community connections and unique field trips.

p.em: Eagle Elementary of Akron is ranked 4.9 out of 5 stars by our parents

div.p: Eagle Elementary of Akron believes that a close connection between home and school is crucial to student performance. Every child needs stability, continuity, and a champion who believes in his or her potential.

p.em: Interested in volunteering at Eagle Elementary? Download our volunteer agreement and email it to info@eagleelementary.org
Its not only good for your taxes, but its good karma too! Click below to learn how you can make a donation to Eagle Elementary and have it count as a tax deduction.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Tatonka Education Services (TES) is a strategic partner with charter schools that is disrupting the traditional management model by providing customized services to develop thriving schools.
We provide operations, financial, and academic services tailored to the individual needs of the school and the community they serve.

We emphasize empowering school leaders, creative problem solving, and transparent operations that develop strong, stable, and flourishing charter schools. We are dedicated to the charter school movement and the immense impact it can have on the lives of children and the surrounding community.
